metadata.title: AKS Web Shell and Code Injection Indicators
metadata.description: Detects indicators of web shells and code injection (Node.js, PHP, Python) in container logs, such as shell execution traces and command output.

properties.displayName: AKS Web Shell and Code Injection Indicators
properties.description: Detects indicators of web shells and code injection (Node.js, PHP, Python) in container logs, such as shell execution traces and command output.
properties.query:
let InjectionPatterns = dynamic([
    "child_process.exec", 
    "child_process.spawn",
    "/bin/sh -c", 
    "cmd.exe /c",
    "uid=0(root)",
    "gid=0(root)",
    "cat /etc/passwd",
    "cat /etc/shadow",
    "whoami",
    "uname -a",
    "subprocess.Popen",
    "os.system",
    "passthru(",
    "shell_exec("
]);
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where LogEntry has_any (InjectionPatterns)
| extend
    ContainerId = ContainerID,
    LogMessage = LogEntry,
    PodName = extract("pod=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource))),
    Namespace = extract("namespace=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource)))
| join kind=leftouter (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | distinct ContainerID, PodName = Name, Namespace, ClusterName, ContainerName
) on $left.ContainerId == $right.ContainerID
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerId,
    LogMessage
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, LogMessage

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Potential web shell or code injection artifact detected in container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}'. Log: {{LogMessage}}
